output.sentences: When we go on vacation we like to take pictures a lot.
We went to London in the winter time, and took a river cruise.
It is really a prime location on the river.
Parliment was super beautiful as we made our way past it.
Even though London is so beautiful, we can't wait to make our way back to CA.
